snippet: A day after migrant workers were beaten and terrorized by rioters, officers detained about 1,200 workers to check for outstanding warrants.
abstract: Russian police detain about 1,200 migrant workers at vegetable market in working-class district of Moscow one day after residents and members of hate groups rampaged through tmarket beating and terrorizing the workers; government's actions are part of a trend in responding to violence against migrants, lest the politically important nationalist segment of society takes offense.
lead_paragraph: A day after migrant workers were beaten and terrorized by rioters, officers detained about 1,200 workers to check for outstanding warrants.

headline.main: Moscow Police Round Up Targets of Riot at Market
headline.print_headline: Moscow Police Round Up Targets of Riot at Market
